title: Orchard on Long
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar
description: A juice bar/take-out that also sells retail health products. Has a variety of vegan choices. All food items are vegetarian. Indoor and outdoor seating are available, but is more of a juices and smoothies take-out place. All juices are vegan made from fresh fruit and vegetables and some smoothies are vegan. Daily specials. Gluten-free options available. Free Wi-Fi.
